When you: 

  • Roll doubles on your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice
  • Roll doubles of any of your Eikonic Numbers on a d20 roll with advantage
  • Roll any of your Eikonic Numbers on a 1d100 roll

Then you can choose to activate one of the following Miracle options:

  • Ex Tempore: Immediately cast a spell as a Non-Action.  
  • Deus Ex Machina: Before the end of your next turn, you can cast a Cleric spell of 1 spell level higher than the highest leveled spell that you know.
  • Ex Nihilo: Before your next rest, the next spell you cast costs no Mana if it is of a spell level equal or lower than half your Proficiency Bonus.
